algorithms.graphs

Class CustomWatershedDAG

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.graphs.CustomWatershedDAG

  • public class CustomWatershedDAG
extends java.lang.Object
    customized DAG for the Watershed class to store the connections between a pixel and its lower intensity neighbors, ordered by steepness. Unused functions have been removed, for example, the nodes do not store incoming connections.
    Author:
    nichole

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public void insert(algorithms.util.PairInt key,
                   CustomWatershedNode orderedSLN)
        insert into DAG for key, the list of nodes ordered such that the steepest is at smallest indexes. It's the invoker's responsibility to insure that the order is correct.
        Parameters:
        key -
        orderedSLN -

      • orderAndInsert

        public void orderAndInsert(algorithms.util.PairInt key,
                           int[] intensityDifferences,
                           algorithms.util.PairInt[] points,
                           int lenUsable)
        insert into DAG for key, the list of nodes after sorting them here such that the steepest is at smallest indexes.
        Parameters:
        key -
        intensityDifferences - an array of lenUsable items holding the difference in intensity of the pixel at key to the intensity of the pixel located in points. Note that the order of this array is altered here.
        points - an array of lenUsable items holding the neighbors of key which had intensities lower than the key's intensity. Note that the order of this array is altered here.
        lenUsable - the number of items in the arrays intensityDifferences and points to read and store.

        Returns:
